data.oai_dc:dc: Historic salvage sale locations (1954 - 1974), Andrews Experimental Forest

Historic salvage sale areas (with buffered roads)Historic salvage timber sales in the H J Andrews from 1954 - 1974 were outlined on a variety of hard copy maps. These manuscripts were digitized into four non-overlapping coverages. Each coverage was turned into a region and the UNION command was used to combine the data into a single coverage of salvage sale regions. The road layer was buffered by 50 yards (45.72 meters)and these areas were added to the coverage.
